page.title: 04Local Schools,Liskeard
page.content: {Liskeard Junior C.P.}occupies the former Modern School(built 1881).4 more rooms and a Hall were added in 1973.There are 189 children(7-11)with 7 teachers.An Area Special Class is attached to the school. {Liskeard Infants}was built in 1958 with a Special Needs unit added in 1982.There are 169 children (4\-7) with 7 teachers(2 part-time). {St.Martin's(CofE)}opened in 1978 and now has 300 children (3\-11 years). There are 10 teachers and 2 part-time remedial teachers. {Liskeard Comprehensive}has a split site with the younger pupils (11-13) using the old Grammar School(built 1908)while the older ones are housed in the former Secondary Modern(built 1961).The Lower school has 440 pupils and 22 teachers.The Upper school has 800 pupils with 79 teachers.
